MyOs  0.0.0
MyOs based on Contiki-Os concepts for memory constrained microcontrollers.

34 #include "rtimer.h"
35 #include <stdlib.h>
36 #include "critical.h"
37 
38 
39 rtimer_t *rtimer_next = NULL;
40 bool rtimer_mutex = false;
41 
42 bool rtimer_lock(void)
43 {
44  bool status = false;
45 
46  CRITICAL_SECTION_BEGIN();
47 
48  if ( !rtimer_mutex )
49  {
50  rtimer_mutex = true;
51  status = true;
52  }
53 
54  CRITICAL_SECTION_END();
55 
56  return status;
57 }
58 
59 void rtimer_release()
60 {
61  rtimer_next = NULL;
62  rtimer_mutex = false;
63 }
64 
65 
66 void rtimer_scheduler (void)
67 {
68  rtimer_t *rtimer = rtimer_next;
69  rtimer_release();
70 
71  if( rtimer->callback )
72  {
73  rtimer->callback(rtimer->data);
74  }
75 }
76 
77 rtimer_timespan_t rtimer_left(rtimer_t *rtimer)
78 {
79  rtimer_timestamp_t now = rtimer_now();
80  rtimer_timestamp_t stop = rtimer_timestamp_stop(rtimer);
81 
82  if( rtimer_timestamp_less_than(now,stop) )
83  {
84  return stop - now;
85  }
86 
87  return 0;
88 }
89 
90 void rtimer_start(rtimer_t *rtimer, rtimer_timespan_t span, rtimer_callback_t callback, void* data)
91 {
92  rtimer->start = rtimer_now();
93  rtimer->span = span;
94  rtimer->callback = callback;
95  rtimer->data = data;
96  rtimer_next = rtimer;
97  rtimer_arch_timer_set(rtimer_timestamp_stop(rtimer));
98 }
99 
100 void rtimer_restart(rtimer_t *rtimer)
101 {
102  rtimer->start = rtimer_now();
103  rtimer_next = rtimer;
104  rtimer_arch_timer_set(rtimer_timestamp_stop(rtimer));
105 }
106 
107 void rtimer_reset(rtimer_t *rtimer)
108 {
109  rtimer->start += rtimer->span;
110  rtimer_next = rtimer;
111  rtimer_arch_timer_set(rtimer_timestamp_stop(rtimer));
112 }
